summary: Have a job as a cook!
descriptionHtml:
Ever noticed how expensive food ingredients are compared to the food itself? Ever notice how the weight-effect ratio of the food makes food nearly useless compared to potions?
Ever wanted to just live a normal life and be a cook?

This is a small mod where cooking complex food actually makes money.

EDIT: I noticed earlier that I didn\'t say exactly what the mod contains. Basically, it increases the  price of the more complex cook-able food and increases their effectiveness, depending on how complex it is. For example, the most effective one, Venison Stew, was revamped to be actually effective in battle, but buying/selling it would take loads of money.

I recommend not using any console commands, exploits, or mods to make barrels or shops reset faster, as the mod loses its point of making you work to find ingredients.

I would like to recommend the Work a Steady Job as a Blacksmith mod by Blacksmith Job Project Team http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16782

This is my first mod. Please make your comments useful and troll-free.
Just give me credit if you\'re going to copy this to another site. It didn\'t really take much time to make. You can edit it any way you want!
author: metamudkip
